subject: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello, how are you doing and hope everything is going well ? i have a profitable business opportunity for you kindly contact me on my email id: 
williamsduato@gmail.com

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm doing well, thank you. How about you? I'm always open to hearing about new opportunities. Could you please provide me with more details about the profitable business you mentioned?

Best wishes,
Neal

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
My name is Mr William Duato , I work with a Veterinary Group of a company
situated in the United States of America  as a Regulatory affairs
specialist.


Our organization is in short supply of raw materials which are immediately
required for the research and manufacturing of mix vaccines and medications
which are applied in the use of pet animal/aquatic/poetry farm injection
treatment across the globe.


The reason for this shortage is as a result of the sudden and unfortunate
passing away of the main supplier of the raw material from India who was Mr
Ramachandran in a fatal automobile car crash. He was buying this raw
material and supplying it to our company in a bulk quantity of 1000 liters
every month.


Now our company doesn’t know the exact source of this raw material which is
in a state in India due to the nature of his transaction arrangement with
our company.


Today however as a matter of urgency and a race against time to save lives
of pet animals I stumbled over his receipts in our company records
department, which unraveled a startling discovery that he was purchasing
this material from the india  manufacturer at a cheaper rate and supplying
to our company at a higher rate and much more profitable.


The name of this raw material is (Apoko B2 Herbal Extract ) Late Mr
Ramachandran was purchasing this material at the rate of 2,500.Usd for 1
liter and supplying to our company at the rate of $7,500Usd for 1 liter,
The receipts reveal that he was making $5000. Usd from each 1 liter and our
company was purchasing 1000 liters every month as per our production
capacity requirements. That means he was making $5,000,000 Usd Every month
which is absolutely profitable.


Now I do not wish to hand over these receipts and transaction information
to our company director because he's a mean and cruel individual and it
wouldn’t be of any benefit to me if I do that. However, I would absolutely
want to involve you in this grand scheme of profitability and endless
possibilities for both of us.


Now Pay Attention! This is what I would need you to do, which is to get in
touch with the raw material manufacturer of the product over there in India
and make inquiries about the availability and selling price of 1 liter of
the raw material and give me feedback.


You will stand in as the middleman to procure the raw material in between
the raw material manufacturer of the product and supply to our company as
the main dealer. Our company requires 1000 liters of this product every
month for the next 12 months and subsequently based on the global demand.


We will split the profit from this transaction in the ratio of 70% to 30%.
You will get to keep 70% and I will travel down to your country to meet
with you and have a celebratory meeting with you and receive my 30%.

If you are business oriented and interested in these profitable business
transactions then do indicate YES! And send me your whatsapp number.


I will send you the contact details of the raw material manufacturer for
you to establish communication and engage in business conversation right
away!

My Regards
Mr William Duato

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Mr. William Duato,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite interesting. I would like to learn more about this business venture and how we can work together to make a profit. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What is the specific raw material that our company requires for the research and production of vaccines?
2. Can you tell me more about the process of procuring and supplying this raw material? How does it work?
3. Are there any legal or regulatory considerations that we need to be aware of when dealing with this product?
4. How long do you anticipate this partnership lasting? Is it a one-time deal or an ongoing arrangement?

I look forward to your response and further discussing the details of this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Neal

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Good Evening Neal,

The minister of health department awarded our company the contract to order
and distribute this product to all veterinary medical Zoo center in the
country under recommended and supported by the World Health Organization
(WHO)

The product is used in these parts of the world to mix vaccines for general
treatments of Agricultural and pet animals and poultry farms, we have been
effectively using this product here since the year 2005 as informed and up
till now that a local dealer is found in India with the best quality and
affordable price offer.

This business will benefit me and you and I advise you to contact the India
 dealer by email or probably phone call and inquire if the product is
available in stock and ask for the product Quotation, their current price
offer per gallon and procedure to deliver the product to you upon order
(FOB) once you contact and receive positive response from the India dealer,
I will also send our company details to enable you contact our CEO for the
supply of the product to them from India.

1. This is a herbal product and it is not in the open market
2.There is no risk in this business and because of the activeness of the
product this is the reason the price is high.
3.Terms of payment is that immediately our company confirms the product
sample from you then our CEO will do wire transfer for any quantity he
wants you to supply to them.
4. I will guide you in every step in this business to make it a success.

Here is the India Company Details..Contact them if they have the product
and ask for their product Quotation.

Company Name: KUMAR ENTERPRISE
Contact person: Mr Baliram Kosti
Mob: +91-8976248423
Email: baliramkosti@kumar-enterprise.co.in
Add: Boyce Road Laitumkhrah Shillong 793003 Meghalaya India,


Note: your role is to purchase from the India dealer in lower price and
supply to our company in higher price and the profit will be share between
you and I and our company is ready to send the new purchasing manager to
your country for the business because it is very urgent…the product export
from your country to USA  will be handle by our company..You can ask the
India Company how many days to deliver the product sample to your address
after you make Order.

 Kindly let me know when you contact and receive a positive response as
required to enable us to proceed to the next level.

 Thank you and please stay safe and make sure you indicate the product name
to the India company when contacting them.

Product Name: (Apoko H2 Herbal Extract )               ( Give me your
whatsapp Number)


My Regards,
Mr William

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Good evening Mr. William,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I'm interested in learning more about the product and how it can benefit both of us. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What is the specific name of the product that your company has been awarded the contract for?
2. How long has your company been using this product, and what kind of results have you seen so far?
3. Can you tell me more about the India dealer? Are they a reputable supplier in the market?
4. What is the current price offer per gallon for the product? Is there any room for negotiation?
5. Could you explain more about the procedure for delivering the product upon order FOB? How long does it typically take to receive an order?

I appreciate your guidance and assistance in making this business venture a success. Once I have all the necessary information, I will contact the India dealer as advised.

Thank you again, and stay safe as well.

Best wishes,
Neal

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Neal,

1. The name of the product is (Apoko H2 Herbal Extract)
2. Our company has been using this product since 2005 and the result has
been excellent.
3.The India company has the reputation in the market because their product
is more active than South American.
4. The Indian company sold at the rate of $12,500.Usd per gallon but you
can negotiate with them but our company will buy from you at the rate of
$37,500.Usd per gallon.
5. To receive the order depends on your destination. The Indian company can
explain to you more about how many days to receive the product in your
destination.

Please tell me your country of origin and send me your whatsapp number for
easy communication.
Thanks
Mr William

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Mr. William,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about the Apoko Herbal Extract product. It's interesting to hear that your company has been using it and experiencing excellent results.

I'm curious to know more about why the Indian company's product is considered more active than the South American one. Could you please provide some details or examples?

Regarding the pricing, it seems like there might be room for negotiation with the Indian company. Can you tell me more about how flexible they are with their pricing? Are there any specific factors that can affect the negotiated rate?

As for my country of origin, I am from . However, before sharing my WhatsApp number, could you please explain why it would be necessary for easy communication? Is there a specific reason why WhatsApp is preferred over other communication methods?

Thank you again for sharing this information with me. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Neal

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Neal,

First contact the Indian company about the product, I wanna speak with you
on whatsapp this is the reason i need it. I am just an employee in this
company and this business must be kept secret between both of us because I
would not like our company to know that I directed you to them. Hope I make
myself clear.

I need your full details?

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Neal,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that you want to keep this business opportunity between us and not involve our company. Can you please provide more information about the Indian company and the product? What is it that they offer and how can we benefit from it?

Also, why do you prefer to communicate on WhatsApp? Is there a specific reason for that? I just want to make sure I understand your requirements clearly.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Neal

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Neal,

Are you a Ghost? Why are you afraid to provide your whatsapp number and
your country of Origin? Your business benefit  with an Indian company is to
purchase the product from them at a lower price and supply it to our
company at higher price. I have explained all the details to you about this
business. Why are you asking and asking again and again?

Provide this information:
Full name
Country of Origin
Occupation
Whatsapp Number
Thanks
Mr William

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Mr. William,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand your concerns, but I prefer not to share personal information such as my full name, country of origin, occupation, and WhatsApp number at this time. However, I am still interested in learning more about the business opportunity you mentioned.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about the product and how it can benefit our company? Also, if there are any specific terms or conditions that we need to be aware of, please let me know.

I appreciate your understanding and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Neal

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Neal,

Contact the India company and ask them to send you the product Quotation
that you are interested in purchasing from them.

Thank you
Mr William

subject: Re: Hello, how are you doing and h
body:
Hello Mr. William,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your suggestion to contact the India company for a product quotation. Could you please provide me with more details about the company and the specific product? I would like to know more before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Neal
